Uses of Class
camzup.core.MeshEntity3

Packages that use MeshEntity3 
Package Description
camzup.core  
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of MeshEntity3 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return MeshEntity3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.append​(Mesh3 mesh)
    Appends a mesh to this mesh entity.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.appendAll​(Mesh3... app)
    Appends a list of meshes to this mesh entity.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.appendAll​(java.util.Collection<Mesh3> app)
    Appends a collection of meshes to this mesh entity.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.scaleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the entity by a scalar.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.scaleBy​(Vec3 scalar)
    Scales the entity by a non-uniform scalar.

    Beware that non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.scaleTo​(float scaleNew)
    Scales the entity to a uniform size.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.scaleTo​(Vec3 scaleNew)
    Scales the entity to a non-uniform size.

    Beware that non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.scaleTo​(Vec3 scalar, float step)
    Eases the entity to a scale by a step over time.

    Beware that non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    MeshEntity3 MeshEntity3.setCoord​(int meshIndex, int coordIndex, Vec3 global, Vec3 local)
    Sets a coordinate in a mesh.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type MeshEntity3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static CurveEntity3 CurveEntity3.fromMeshEntity​(MeshEntity3 me, CurveEntity3 target)
    Creates a curve entity from a mesh entity.
